Children need accurate and comprehensive information about sex: When it comes to sexuality, children need accurate and comprehensive information to understand the complex and multifaceted aspects of sexuality. Research shows that children who receive accurate and age-appropriate information about sex are more likely to develop healthy attitudes and behaviors around sexuality. (2)
